name: Poway
shortDescription: Affluent suburban community known as 'The City in the Country' with top-rated schools and equestrian culture.
fullDescription: Poway combines rural charm with suburban amenities, featuring the Poway Center for Performing Arts, Lake Poway, and extensive trail systems. Its highly-rated school district attracts families while maintaining a semi-rural character with horse properties and open spaces.
heroImageAlt: Rolling hills and open space near Poway

neighborhoods.name: San Marcos
neighborhoods.description: City to the northwest with Cal State San Marcos, trails, and growing dining options.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Rolling green hills near San Marcos

neighborhoods.name: Escondido
neighborhoods.description: Neighboring city to the north with Grand Avenue dining and San Diego Safari Park.

neighborhoods.name: San Diego
neighborhoods.description: Major metropolitan center with employment hubs and cultural attractions.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: San Diego skyline viewed from the bay

neighborhoods.name: Santee
neighborhoods.description: East County city with lakeside parks and convenient access to Mission Trails.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Rolling hills and open space near Santee

highlights.title: Top-Rated Schools
highlights.description: Poway Unified School District is consistently ranked among California's best school systems.

highlights.title: Lake Poway Recreation
highlights.description: 160-acre lake offering fishing, hiking trails, picnic areas and stunning views.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Lakeside park and walking path near Poway

highlights.title: Equestrian Culture
highlights.description: Semi-rural character with horse properties, riding trails and the Poway Rodeo.

highlights.title: Community Events
highlights.description: Annual events like the Poway Days Parade and Christmas in the Park.

faqs.question: What are the best neighborhoods in Poway?
faqs.answer: Popular areas include the Heritage community, Twin Peaks area, and neighborhoods near Lake Poway.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Poway?
faqs.answer: Poway Unified is one of California's top districts, with multiple Blue Ribbon and California Distinguished Schools.

faqs.question: What is there to do in Poway?
faqs.answer: Enjoy Lake Poway, hiking trails, Old Poway Park, and community events throughout the year.

faqs.question: How is the commute to Sorrento Valley?
faqs.answer: About 20-30 minutes via SR-56 and I-15 to major biotech and tech employers.

schema_markup.name: Poway

mainEntity.name: Why is Poway called 'The City in the Country'?

acceptedAnswer.text: Poway maintains a semi-rural character with horse properties, open spaces and trails while offering suburban amenities and excellent schools.
